summary: A standalone and simple Follower Mod
descriptionHtml:
This follower is standalone and based on my woodelf preset - Chromidis.

[b]Location: [/b]

Found in the Bannered Mare of Whiterun (console command "coc whiterunbanneredmare" to teleport to the place)


[b]Combat:[/b]

- very skilled with bow, because he doesn't like other weapons, but can use them aswell
- won't use shouts, magic and staves
- comes with no armor and weapon (just fine clothes so he isn't naked)
- Lightfoot perk, some basic perks for archery, if it's too OP, please let me know!
- levels with you
- essential, unique


[b]Misc.:[/b]

- can be married
- can be a steward (he should meet the requirements because of voicetype and being a follower, I can be wrong)
- voice is MaleEvenToned


[b]Armor I used for the screenshots:[/b]

Maria Hunter Armor by Team Tal


I wish you good hunting with him!



[b]Credits [/b]
